name: angularjs.typescript.library.starter
description: This is an AngularJS module to provide lots of different helper services

scripts.postinstall: npm link typescript && npm link webpack
scripts.//: On a unix environment you wouldn't be able to use start see: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30950032/how-can-i-run-multiple-npm-scripts-in-parallel
scripts.start: start npm run build:lib && start npm run build:testWeb && start npm run start:http
